title: (x) 'A Festa de Cinema' - FF DIN {Mike Y}
content:
i cant seem to find this font. it seems similar to din.. i cannot find the exact one.  
please, help me out..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014223851im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whichfont_3957.png)
author: eks

comments.content:
I think it looks like DIN. Why did you think that was not the answer? Did you look at FF DIN as well, which has more weights?

- Mike Yanega
err.. youre right. :) i dont know how ive skipped that one. i obviously didnt see all dins. !!thankyoou. :]
